named-query.name: BC_READ_FIRST_SKU
named-query.query: SELECT sku FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.SkuImpl sku WHERE sku.id = (SELECT MIN(smallSku.id) FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.SkuImpl smallSku)

named-query.name: BC_READ_SKUS_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT sku FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.catalog.domain.SkuImpl sku WHERE sku.id IN (:skuIds)
